org.xbib.marc.xml

Class MarcXchangeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcContentHandler
      • org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcXchangeWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, MarcListener, MarcRecordListener, MarcXchangeConstants, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class MarcXchangeWriter
extends MarcContentHandler
implements java.io.Flushable, java.io.Closeable
    This MarcXchange Writer writes MarcXchange events to a StaX XML output stream or XML event consumer. Default output format is MarcXchange.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.xbib.marc.xml.MarcContentHandler

        Parameters:
        fileNamePattern - file name pattern
        splitlimit - split write limit
        bufferSize - buffer size
        compress - if true, compress MarcXchange output
        indent - if true, indent MarcXchange output

        java.io.IOException - if writer can not be created
